required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Training and Evaluate Effect on Clinical Airway Management for Novices.
clinical_study.official_title: The Training and Evaluate Effect of Simulation on Clinical Airway Management for Novices During Perioperative Period

brief_summary.textblock: In this self-control experiment, anesthesiologists without experiment of bronchoscopy working in anesthesiology department in Peking Union Medical College Hospital will receive a training and evaluation procedure in simulation and clinical practice about clinical airway management. The objects was (1) to investigate the improvements of manufacturing bronchoscopy in simulation and clinical practice before and after training on simulation, (2) to record the study curve and efforts trainees needed to achieve proficiency and self-confidence on simulation, (3) to record the curve of manufacturing from skilled to unskilled, (4)to evaluate if status manufacturing on simulations could reflect the ones in clinical practice.

detailed_description.textblock: A modified global rating scale from 1 (unskilled) to 5 (expert) with a score of 3 linked to proficiency, and 5-points Likert from 1 (felt extremely unsure) to 5 (felt extremely confidence) with a score of 4 linked to confidence were used to evaluate during the procedure of training and evaluation.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline after finishing simulate training, an average of 1 month.
primary_outcome.description: Change of time needed to navigate using bronchoscopy.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of modified global rating scores (GRS).
primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline after finishing simulate training, an average of 1 month.
primary_outcome.description: Change of modified global rating scores (GRS) rating manufacturing skills using bronchoscopy. Total score ranges from 4 to 20 scores at 1-score intervals, higher score matches better skill. Total score is the submission of four subscales, which evaluating central view, mucosal contact, progress and orientation using bronchoscopy, ranges from 1 to 5 scores at 1-score interval, higher scores represent better outcome.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Changes from baseline after finishing simulate training, an average of 1 month.
primary_outcome.description: Change of Likert score evaluating self-confidence using bronchoscopy. Likert score ranges from 1 to 5 scores at 1-score intervals, higher score with more self-confidence.

secondary_outcome.measure: Inconsistency of evaluation of time needed between simulate and clinical practice.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day, 2 days, and every continuous 7 days until 1 month after training.
secondary_outcome.description: Inconsistency of time needed to navigate using bronchoscopy.

secondary_outcome.measure: Inconsistency of evaluation of modified global rating scores between simulate and clinical practice.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day, 2 days, and every continuous 7 days until 1 month after training.
secondary_outcome.description: Inconsistency of modified global rating scores (GRS) rating manufacturing skills, using bronchoscopy. Total score ranges from 4 to 20 scores at 1-score intervals, higher score matches better skill. Total score is the submission of four subscales, which evaluating central view, mucosal contact, progress and orientation using bronchoscopy, ranges from 1 to 5 scores at 1-score interval, higher scores represent better outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Inconsistency of evaluation of Likert socre between simulate and clinical practice.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day, 2 days, and every continuous 7 days until 1 month after training.
secondary_outcome.description: Inconsistency of Likert score evaluating self-confidence using bronchoscopy. Likert score ranges from 1 to 5 scores at 1-score intervals, higher score with more self-confidence.

other_outcome.time_frame: An average of 6 hours, since begin of simulate training.

arm_group.description: Anesthesiologists without experiment of manufacturing bronchoscopy.

intervention.description: Using the simulate device, the novices in bronchoscopy are going to trained and evaluated the ability of driving bronchoscopy in simulate device and clinical practice.
